attributes.action: Condemn the Prime Minister's attack on our constitution in her 20 March remarks
attributes.background:
In her Downing Street statement on the evening of 20 March 2019, the Prime Minister blamed MPs for voting down her awful Withdrawal Agreement.

We, the people, stand united with Parliament in condemning this disgracefully reckless attack on the constitutional system of the United Kingdom.

rejection.details: The views of individual MPs are not the responsibility of the UK Parliament as a whole.
